column2: Pacific Ethanol, Inc. engages in the production and marketing of carbon renewable fuel. The company is headquartered in Sacramento, California and currently employs 510 full-time employees. The firm's segments include a production segment and a marketing segment. As of December 31, 2016, the Company owned and operated eight ethanol production facilities, of which four plants are in the Western states of California, Oregon and Idaho, and four of its plants are located in the Midwestern states of Illinois and Nebraska. As of December 31, 2016, its plants had a combined ethanol production capacity of 515 million gallons per year. The firm markets all the ethanol and co-products produced at its plants as well as ethanol produced by third parties. The firm produces ethanol and co-products at its production facilities. Its plants are located on the West Coast and in the Midwest. The firm produces ethanol and co-products at its production facilities. Its plants are located on the West Coast and in the Midwest are in the heart of the Corn Belt.
